original_title: 放送デキナイ　禁断　霊映像4
overview: The fourth collection of psychic videos that collect broadcast-banned videos. There is a figure of a spirit in the picture of Eisa at the stage greeting at the time of the theatrical release and the video of Director Yamamoto who is battling illness due to real calamity... Disappearance (back and back) and about 10 other videos are included.
title: Broadcast Dekinai Forbidden Spirit Video 4
